title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of the European Central Bank is Christine Lagarde, previously the chair and managing director of the International Monetary Fund.

title: 'Europe's existential crisis': ECB's Lagarde calls for urgent reforms | Euronews
snippet: ECB President Christine Lagarde urged the European Commission to dismantle internal trade barriers, warning they stifle competitiveness.

title: European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The current president of the ECB is Christine Lagarde. Seated in Frankfurt, Germany, the bank formerly occupied the Eurotower prior to the construction of its new seat. The ECB is directly governed by European Union law. Its capital stock, worth €11 billion, is owned by all 27 central banks ...

title: ECB may lift growth outlook again, Lagarde says | Reuters
snippet: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde delivers her keynote speech at Euro Finance Week, a weeklong annual financial conference in Frankfurt, Germany, November 21, 2025.
